      public void sendPlayCard​(String cardName)
      Methode to send the played card in a PlayCard- Message to the clientModel which will send the message to the server to be handled
      Parameters:
      cardName - string vlaue of the played-card name

    • sendSelectedCards

      public void sendSelectedCards​(int registerNum, String cardName)
      Methode that sends choosen cards by the player after placing them in registers in a SelectedCard- Message to the clientModel which will send the message to the server to be handled
      Parameters:
      cardName - string vlaue of the played-card name
      registerNum - is an int value of the current register

    • sendRetrunCards

      public void sendRetrunCards​(ArrayList<String> allReturnedCardsL)
      Methode that sends the choosen return-cards by the player after playing the upgrade Card MemorySwap. Then send it in ReturnCards Message
      Parameters:
      allReturnedCardsL - an ArrayList of strings of all 3 returned choosen-cards

    • createMapObjects

      public void createMapObjects​(ArrayList<ArrayList<ArrayList<Element>>> map, int mapX, int mapY)
      Methode to set Map Objects with their Type, isOnBoard and Orientation and put it in a Hashmap for each Element in order to save their Location and ElementTyp in a Hashmap this will serve the purpose of easy accessing to every map-element and its properties
      Parameters:
      map - is a 3D ArrayList of the jsonMap
      mapX - is the x Demension of the Map
      mapY - is the y Demension of the Map

    • buyUpgradeCard

      public void buyUpgradeCard​(String cardName)
      Methode that check if its allowed to buy an UpgradeCard using the MEthode checkAllowtoBuy and then send cardName to BuyUpgradeBody with a boolean value isBuying whether the player is buying or not and the cardName of the upgradeCard
      Parameters:
      cardName - is a String value of the Upgrade Card name

    • checkAllowToBuy

      public boolean checkAllowToBuy​(String cardName)
      Methode to check if the Player is allowed to buy an Upgrade Card in case of having enough Energy and not more than 3 of each permanent and Temporary Upgrade Cards Depending on all mensioned condtions, the methode returns a boolean value if the player can or cant buy the choosen Upgrad card
      Parameters:
      cardName - a String Value of the choosen card name
      Returns:
      boolean value gives the permission to buy the card or not

    • getUpgradeCost

      public int getUpgradeCost​(String cardName)
      Methode to lookup the price of player-choice of an Upgrade Card
      Parameters:
      cardName - String value of the choosen card
      Returns:
      int value of the cost of the choosen upgrade Card

      Parameters:

      Returns:
